import React from"react";import Button from"react-bootstrap/Button";import{TextField}from"@material-ui/core";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Form(_ref){var refreshHandler=_ref.refreshHandler,inputText=_ref.inputText,setInputText=_ref.setInputText,session=_ref.session;var inputTextHandler=function inputTextHandler(e){setInputText(e.target.value);};// Possibly refactor submit handler using async await for consistency with other handlers
var submitHandler=function submitHandler(e){e.preventDefault();var newSkill={text:inputText,level:1,percent:0,user_id:session.user_id};if(inputText!=""){axios.post("/api/users/add-skill",newSkill).then(function(res){console.log("Response Data:",res.data);refreshHandler();});}setInputText("");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"input-form",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-field",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{className:"input-field",placeholder:"Enter New Skill",onChange:inputTextHandler,type:"text",inputProps:{min:0,style:{textAlign:"center",fontSize:"30px",color:"white"}}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:submitHandler,variant:"primary",type:"submit",style:{borderRadius:"25px"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-plus"})})]})});}export default Form;
